title: Virtual RiscPC (VRPC-SE) updated to April 2010
description:
+----------------------------------------------------------------------+
        |                                                                      |
        |   Supplied......:  Acorn Antiques    Release name..:  VRPCSE.rar     |
        |   Packaged......:  filth             Release type..:  Util           |
        |   Protection....:  none              Language......:  English        |
        |   Crack/SN......:  n/a               Size..........:  33.9 MB        |
        |   Format........:  ISO inside RAR    OS............:  RISC OS        |
        |                                                                      |
        |   MD5 checksum.................: 869728f565d5b673ad647af82c0e9f61    |
        |                                                                      |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                            Description                               |
        |   ================================================================   |
        |                                                                      |
        |   "Virtual Acorn allows you to run the Acorn operating system        |
        |   RISC OS on a Windows PC with Windows 2000, XP, Vista or            |
        |   Windows 7, and on a fast G4, G5 or Intel Mac with                  |
        |   Mac OS X 10.4 or later. Any RISC OS programs can then be           |
        |   run on the PC. VirtualAcorn can operate inside a window,           |
        |   just like any other Windows application, but can also run          |
        |   full screen. In full screen mode the PC looks and feels            |
        |   just like an Acorn computer. VirtualAcorn requires no              |
        |   extra hardware to be fitted in your PC and can be                  |
        |   installed in minutes."                                             |
        |                                                                      |
        |   A comprehensive emulator of the Acorn RiscPC platform, including   |
        |   RISC OS 4.02 software with networking capability.                  |
        |                                                                      |
        |   VirtualRPC-SE for Windows patched with all released patches        |
        |   (as of April 2010), and cracked to remove its required             |
        |   product activation.                                                |
        |                                                                      |
        |   Install is a directory to drop into "Program Files" and tested on  |
        |   Windows XP.                                                        |
        |                                                                      |
        +----------------------------------------------------------------------+

        |   Visit our profile for more, including some vary rare releases!     |
